title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s core open-source repo: lets you pull, run, and manage GGUF models locally via a simple CLI and REST API.
highlights: pull & run Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for the Ollama API—chat, embed, pull, push, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama for chat, completion, and embeddings pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured, self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama—chat history, multi-user, model manager.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; offers fluent builder API, streaming, and custom timeout options.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API—chat, embed, list, delete models.

title: ollama-cli (rich TUI)
summary: Experimental rich terminal UI for browsing and chatting with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion agent inside VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C#/.NET SDK for Ollama—targets .NET 6+ with async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with Open-WebUI, Postgres, and nginx.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama-index to chat over PDFs offline.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake adding Ollama binaries and an Ollama module to nixpkgs for declarative deployments.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for LLM-powered tests.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension adding a side-panel chat powered by any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-macos-swiftui
summary: Native macOS SwiftUI app that lists, downloads, and chats with Ollama models via menu-bar.
